_header: When the Raven cryeth before the Crow
_description: Signs to know what is to come (prognostication) by raven’s and crow’s cries, possibly with political interpretation — two couplets

Lincoln129.Transcription:
Whan the Raven cryeth be for the Crowethou may the husbonde ere &
                    soweWhan the Crowe cryeth befor the Raventhan drawe Shippis in to the
                    haven
Lincoln129.Note: Added to flyleaf by a later hand.
